# Pursuant to the Scheme of Amalgamation of Kemstar Metals Limited with our Company filed under sections 391 to 394 of the Companies Act, 1956, as sanctioned by the Hon'ble High Court of Bombay pursuant to its order dated April 01, 2010. The appointed date of the Scheme of Amalgamation was April 01, 2008.
